reviews.text: I would say it's an above average bowl of mee pok. A big plus is that it is not as salty as the ones I came across that left me super thristy. The two folks at the store were also friendly, polite, and attentive, which was another bonus. Overall, it is a place i will still come by to have minced meat noodles when I am around the place. Probably try out the signature one with abalone, too.

I support local hawkers trying to make it . The prerequisite is the sincerity of the product and services. 6SGD for a deluxe mince pork noodles. Noodles portion is a lady fist size. Two meat ball, one 5 spice stick , 2 slice of mock abalones, mince meat and an onsen egg. That's about it. Got there before 6pm , ran out of chop chili. Nothing outstanding but quite lack of motivation to operate.

Portion suit for small eater like me. Ingredients like minced meat quite generous and the noodle texture v springyüëåüèªüëåüèª. Tho like some said, i find it abit salty too. Overall i dun mind to try the meepok next round :)
Ordered buta don, meepok dry and mee kia dry. Noodle portion is just nice, taste acceptable, not so keen on the meatballs as it feels Smashy..the Don presentation is nice but aste average.

Their menu looked interesting hence I ordered their bar chor mee, mazesoba and meatball soup.

Bar chor mee: noodles were overcooked, to the extent it‚Äôs a little soggy, not what you want for a meepok dry dish. Taste was ok. A solid 3/5 for this.

Mazesoba: For a delivery/takeaway, chef didn‚Äôt consider how dry it would become, making it hard to mix everything together, I had to improvise by adding soup from the meatball soup. It was weird in taste as the soup I added wasn‚Äôt Japanese, but somehow it blended in well. Noodles were much better here compared to the meepok. Overall it was relatively tasty as well. 4/5

Meatball soup: somewhat disappointing as I thought the meatballs would be larger, given what was shown on the grab app. They did mention that it was a generated image but still the disparity was totally misleading. However the meatballs tasted decent. 3/5

Overall ok but I won‚Äôt go out of the way to eat this.
